thread.title: Upgrade Albo spends $100 million on road to his weekender
thread.title_full: Upgrade Albo spends $100 million on road to his weekender

author: Newton999
title: Upgrade Albo spends $100 million on road to his weekender
text:
The senate requested the business case for Avoca Road but was denied.
It is taxpayers money but we are not allowed to see why they spend millions on a road to Albos weekender.
“The release of correspondence relating to discussions between the Australian and NSW Governments on projects funded under the Infrastructure Investment Program (IIP) would constitute a risk to Commonwealth-State relations and therefore will not be provided as part of this request.”[https://x.com/SenatorRennick/status/1868906560069550090]
